items.name: LEVERKUSEN

hoursOfOperation.remarks:
Summer:
Monday to Saturday 08.00-11:00 and 12:00-16:30 UTC 
Sunday or holiday 08.00-11:00 and 13:00-16:30 UTC 

Winter:
Monday to Saturday 09:00-12:00 and 13:00-17:30 UTC 
Sunday or holiday 09:00-12:00 and 14:00-17:30 UTC 

Other times between BCMT and ECET PPR.

items.contact: www.vliegveldmiddenmeer.nl
items.remarks:
Two-way radio communication on channel 123.430 is required. Middenmeer has no manned ground station. All radio-communication is air-to-air. 
Pilots will report position and intentions to inform other traffic.

items.remarks:
Local Regulations/Remarks
a. RWY 11/29: After take-off climb to 500 FT before turning.
b. After take-off from RWY 11/29 the built-up areas Strammelse, Knudsbølle, and Rantzausminde shall be passed at the greatest distance possible.
c. Traffic Circuit south of runway only.
d. Helicopter not permitted, except for SAR missions and ambulance flights.
